attributes.action: Ensure there is a TV debate for the 2017 General Election between party leaders.
attributes.background: Whatever your political leaning a democracy functions best when the electorate is well informed. The early reports that the Conservative party will not partake is frankly disturbing.  As the ruling party they have a responsibility more than anyone to champion democracy. Ensure complete attendance.

rejection.details:
A decision about whether to host a debate would be the responsibility of the broadcasters, not the UK Government or Parliament.

A decision about whether to take part in a debate  would be for Theresa May to make as leader of the Conservative party, not as the Prime Minister. We can only accept petitions about the Prime Minister’s actions as part of the Government, not as the leader of a political party.

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/195600
